I am a purpose driven Digital Product Designer specializing in user experience design, user research, and front-end development. A perpetual scholar and avid gamer, I love leveling up my skills across design and development. When I'm not designing and writing code, I enjoy speaking, writing, drawing, and giving back to organizations that help pave the way for the next generation.

I am currently looking for new opportunities.
